attributes.action: Justice for all in the face of adversity
attributes.additional_details: If an individual, present in the Uk is accused  by another country of a crime and it is deemed unsafe to deport  said individual to the accusing country  for whatever reason  they should be tried in the UK under UK law for the said crime  and if found guilty sentenced under UK law according.Thereby protecting the individual,the state and all within the Uk. The aim of which is justice for all .
